coreAttributes.name: spreader bar
coreAttributes.description: A pair of ankle restraints, attached to one another by a long metal pole. When worn, the wearer's legs are forced open.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(wrap)] the spreader bar's restraints around [npc.her] ankles and [npc.verb(fasten)] the straps, leaving [npc.her] [npc.legs] spread wide open.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(wrap)] the spreader bar's restraints around [npc2.namePos] ankles and [npc.verb(fasten)] the straps, leaving [npc2.her] [npc2.legs] spread wide open.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(wrap)] the spreader bar's restraints around [npc2.namePos] ankles and tightly [npc.verb(fasten)] the straps, leaving [npc2.her] [npc2.legs] spread wide open.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the spreader bar's restraints and [npc.verb(remove)] it from around [npc.her] ankles.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the restraints on [npc2.namePos] spreader bar and [npc.verb(remove)] it from around [npc2.her] ankles.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unfasten)] the restraints on [npc2.namePos] spreader bar and quickly [npc.verb(remove)] it from around [npc2.her] ankles.
